definition: Kangxi radical 61 (心) as a vertical side element

sentences.english: Thanks so much. I owe you one.
sentences.chinese: 真谢谢你，我欠你一份情。

sentences.english: Yes, certainly there's a relationship between these two guys.
sentences.chinese: 有，这两人之间确实有一段情。

sentences.english: Lushen ( a goddess in Chinese myth) was a symbol of feeling and desire.
sentences.chinese: 洛神原型是情与欲的象征。

sentences.english: People have emotions, feelings did not ring true To reach the grief of Health.
sentences.chinese: 人有七情六欲，情不顺欲不达则悲生。

sentences.english: No matter the size of gifts, and use crystal will pass on the friendship between different conditions.
sentences.chinese: 无论礼品大小，用上水晶便传上了不一样的友谊情。

sentences.english: I had expected the ring finger of the love, but it is the feeling or debt.
sentences.chinese: 我曾期望无名指的爱，却不知它是情还是债。

sentences.english: "Neng" is an auxiliary verb which means to have the ability to or possibility of doing something.
sentences.chinese: “能”是助动词，表示有能力或者可能做某件事情。

sentences.english: Tulip changing our lives, led by the Department of Shanyou our great love.
sentences.chinese: 郁金香改变着我们的生活，牵系着我们的汕大情。

sentences.english: As you write more Love Letters it becomes easier and works better.
sentences.chinese: 情书写愈多就愈容易写，而且愈有效。

sentences.english: Neng" in this case represents the ability to or possibility of doing something."
sentences.chinese: “能”表示有能力或者可能做某件事情。

sentences.english: Men do not understand how a woman can be a determination to forget the situation.
sentences.chinese: 而男人不明白怎么女人可以这么决心的忘了一段情。

sentences.english: Su and Wen are cousins with an age difference of twenty-two years.
sentences.chinese: 兩人为相差二十二岁之表兄弟，情真意切，知己知彼。

sentences.english: The richness of mood determines the colorfulness of music.
sentences.chinese: “情”的丰富复杂，决定了“乐”的多姿多彩。

sentences.english: Li Ming is just the tyke ( whom ) I wish to see.
sentences.chinese: 李明正是表错七日情想要见非诚勿扰男孩。

sentences.english: There are many answers, and those answers are natural conditions of the affair.
sentences.chinese: 答案有很多，那些答案自然也是与情有染的。

sentences.english: As is known to all, the keynote of the Peony Pavilion is love.
sentences.chinese: 众所周知，《牡丹亭》的主旨是写“情”。
